mapper.select: select pm.member_id, pm.member_name, pi.item_id, pi.item_name, pwd.record_date, pwd.quantity from pokemon_warehouse_distribution pwd left join pokemon_member pm on pm.member_id = pwd.member_id left join pokemon_item pi on pi.item_id = pwd.item_id order by pwd.record_date desc, pi.item_id, pwd.quantity, pm.join_date
